Start.Speaker: C1
Start.Content: Hey, they finally brought the pizza in for our group!

2.Speaker: C2
2.Content: Yea, but I don't think they enough food for each us...

3.Speaker: C1
3.Content: I guess we can all go to dinner somewhere else instead.

5.Speaker: C1
5.Content: I heard that they recently open a new Giordano's on Halsted. If you want, you can join us.
